55  int Landmark::detect(std::vector<std::vector<cv::Point> > &contours, Descriptor &descriptor){
56  // Allocate memory for computing descriptors and similarity for each contour
57  std::vector<Descriptor> candidate(contours.size());
58  std::vector<int> similarity(contours.size());
59  // Miscellaneous variables and flags
60  int index=-1;
61  double max_score = 0;
62  bool landmark_detected = false;
63 
64 
65  // Search for landmark!
66  for( int i=0; i<contours.size(); i++){
67  if (contours[i].size() < 5)
68  continue;
69 
70  int inv_score=0;
71  double dyn_score=0;
72 
73  // Assemble dynamic descriptor
74  candidate[i].assemble(contours[i], (INVARIANT | DYNAMIC) );
75  if (candidate[i].dynamic.area < 20) // discard small blob (noise)
76  continue;
77  // Compute smilarity in respect to base descriptor
78  candidate[i].similarity(this->base_, this->range_, inv_score, dyn_score );
79 
80  // Have we already detected and locked on the landmark?
81  if( this->lock == false ){ // No! Do not account for the dynamic score, conservative in repesct to invariant characteristics
82  if( (inv_score > this->min_score) && (inv_score > max_score) ){
83  max_score = inv_score;
84  index = i;
85  landmark_detected = true;
86  }
87  }else{ // Yes! Account for dynamic score (tracking component), liberal in respect to invariant characteristics
88  if ( (inv_score > (this->min_score-3)) && (dyn_score > max_score) ){
89  max_score = dyn_score;
90  index = i;
91  landmark_detected = true;
92  }
93  }
94 
95  }
96 
97  // Save descriptor when landmark detected
98  if (landmark_detected){
99  descriptor = candidate[index];
100  this->base_.dynamic.uc = candidate[index].dynamic.uc;
101  this->base_.dynamic.vc = candidate[index].dynamic.vc;
102  this->base_.dynamic.radius = candidate[index].dynamic.radius;
103  this->base_.dynamic.area = candidate[index].dynamic.area;
104  }
105  return index;
106 
107 
108  }

118  bool Landmark::learnMinMax(const cv::Mat image, const cv::Point offset, Descriptor &descriptor, std::vector<cv::Point> blob_contours){
119  // Number of learning iterations
120  static Descriptor min, max;
121 
122  // Detect edges using canny
123  cv::Mat mat =image.clone();
124 
125  // Find contours
126  std::vector<std::vector<cv::Point> > contours;
127  std::vector<cv::Vec4i> hierarchy;
128  cv::findContours( mat, contours, hierarchy, CV_RETR_EXTERNAL, CV_CHAIN_APPROX_NONE , offset );
129 
130  // Allocate memory for computing descriptors and similarity for each contour
131  std::vector<Descriptor> candidate(contours.size());
132  std::vector<int> similarity(contours.size());
133  // Miscellaneous variables and flags
134  int index;
135  double score, max_score = 0;
136  bool landmark_detected = false;
137 
138  // Search for landmark!
139  for( int i=0; i<contours.size(); i++){
140  if (contours[i].size() < 5)
141  continue;
142 
143  int inv_score=0;
144  double dyn_score=0;
145  // Assemble dynamic descriptor (we just want the area)
146  candidate[i].assemble(contours[i], (INVARIANT | DYNAMIC) );
147  candidate[i].similarity(this->base_, this->range_, inv_score, dyn_score );
148  // Is this the first learning iteration?
149  if(this->learning_ == false) // Yes! Then we are searching for the largest blob in the scene (score == area).
150  score = candidate[i].dynamic.area;
151  else // No! Then, we are searching for the most similar blob from last time observed.
152  score = dyn_score;
153 
154  // Is this the most similar descriptor so far?
155  if( score > max_score ){ // Yes! Then save the current index
156  max_score = score;
157  index = i;
158  landmark_detected = true;
159  }else if (score == max_score){ // The same as the hightest. We can not say anything..
160  landmark_detected = false;
161  }
162  }
163 
164  // Did we find the landmark?
165  if (landmark_detected) { // Yes! Then update the min, max, base and range descriptors.
166  // First time detecting the landmark?
167  if(this->learning_ == false){ // Yes! Start learing
168  max = candidate[index];
169  min = candidate[index];
170  this->base_ = candidate[index];
171  this->learning_ = true;
172  } else{ // No! Update base and range values
173  max = max.max(candidate[index]);
174  min = min.min(candidate[index]);
175 
176  this->base_ = max*0.5 + min*0.5;
177  this->range_ = this->base_ - min;
178  }
179 
180  // Saving current dynamic values
181  this->base_.dynamic.uc = candidate[index].dynamic.uc;
182  this->base_.dynamic.vc = candidate[index].dynamic.vc;
183  this->base_.dynamic.radius = candidate[index].dynamic.radius;
184  this->base_.dynamic.area = candidate[index].dynamic.area;
185 
186  descriptor = this->base_;
187  }
188 
189  return landmark_detected;
190 
191  }
192 
193 } // closing landmark namespace
